name: Event Marketing Plans
description: Creating a strategic marketing plan to promote your upcoming event.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Develop an event marketing plan for event, based on information {{event_name}} that includes [details] {{date_time}} {{target_audience}} {{channels}} {{budget}} and [goals] {{goal}}.

goal.title: Event Goals
goal.description: What you hope to achieve with your event (e.g., increase brand awareness, generate leads, drive sales).

ui_metadata.value: Increase brand awareness for our music production software (Acme Audio Suite) Generate leads for potential software customers Educate attendees on the basics of music production  pen_spark

budget.title: Budget (Optional)
budget.description: If comfortable, specify your marketing budget to help tailor recommendations

channels.title: Marketing Channels (Optional)
channels.description: Select the marketing channels you plan to use

ui_metadata.value: Social Media Marketing (Organic & Paid) Email Marketing

date_time.title: Event Date & Time
date_time.description: The date and time your event will take place.

ui_metadata.value: Saturday, June 8th, 2024, from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM

target_audience.title: Target Audience
target_audience.description: Who you are trying to reach with your event marketing efforts (e.g., industry professionals, students, general public).

ui_metadata.value: Aspiring music producers and musicians with a basic understanding of music creation Hobbyists interested in learning how to record and produce their own music at home Students enrolled in music production or music technology programs  pen_spark    tune  share   more_vert
